title: Stop Clipboard Hijacking: Catch Address Swaps Fast
quickSteps: Treat the paste action as the decision point, not the copy action.
Verify three parts of the destination string, including one middle chunk.
Reduce clipboard use by using saved destinations and QR scanning.
Separate long-term funds from high-risk activity with role-based wallets.
If a string changes unexpectedly, stop sending and treat the device as compromised until you can verify otherwise.

seo.keywords: clipboard hijacking, crypto address changed after copy, wallet address replacement, crypto malware, browser extension security, verify address after paste, secure copy paste, crypto swap xmr
seo.description: Clipboard hijacking can replace a copied crypto address before you paste. Learn quick checks that catch swaps and hygiene that prevents repeats.
